text: one of my favorite parts of cooking with
tofu is that the tofu picks up all the
flavors of the dish you're cooking it
with and today we're gonna make tofu
with chimichurri on toast we're gonna
grill the whole thing if you've had bad
luck with tofu in the past this is going
to set you free so start by chopping up
half a cup of flat parsley leaves
chimichurri is a sauce typically found
in Argentina and it's mostly chopped
parsley garlic a little bit of vinegar
but you can really customize it to
whatever you'd like so today I'm going
to use chopped parsley and chopped
oregano chop up the parsley it doesn't
have to be super fine just coarsely
chopped now's as good a time as any to
add our oregano looks like it's rearing
to go I have two tablespoons of picked
oregano same thing just a really coarse
chop okay
so add this to a bowl along with 1

probably about 2 cloves this is a really

flake add a nice amount of heat season
with salt then add our acids I'm gonna
add 1/4 cup of sherry vinegar you can
also use white wine vinegar red wine
vinegar and 1/3 cup of olive oil the

once all your ingredients are combined
